ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried oregano,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves,   +   1/4 cup water, 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules, 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley
